function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential enteric transmission of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Increased risk of infection through exposure to wastewater","Mitigation":"Enhanced sanitation measures and wastewater treatment","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment technologies","People":"Those working with human waste and wastewater","Owner":"Public health authorities and wastewater management organizations"},{"Description":"Limited diagnostic capacity in areas with poor sanitation","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying and controlling the spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Improvement of diagnostic capacity and implementation of wastewater surveillance","Technologies":"Mobile diagnostic units, wastewater testing kits","People":"Healthcare workers, local health authorities","Owner":"International health organizations, local governments"},{"Description":"Potential community spread of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Increased transmission of the virus in affected geographic areas","Mitigation":"Strict public health measures, social distancing, and hygiene practices","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, public health communication tools","People":"General public in affected geographic areas","Owner":"Government health departments, public health agencies"}]}
